Indeed he should, he doesn't make player feel "blind", but then we will need to give him X - Ray sweeper auto spot on champion...

I was literally thinking this when I was looking at that ability.

imo, he shouldn't have exactly that effect (it's already on the new champion). But I do think it would be really cool to have some type of effect like this. Something like: he has reduced vision range, but when using abilities he uses a sonar type system around it's area of effect to detect if someone/something is there. 

I think that something like that could be really interesting and potentially give him a unique trade-off for power if done right. Hopefully if Lee Sin gets a rework at some point they'll visit this kind of idea.
if we were being realistic... Lee would be able to see *everything*. Stealth and walls wouldn't mean anything...
Could be interesting, though would need a lot of tuning.
